select
,(select s.shop_name from shop s where oo.shop_id=s.shop_id) shop_name, ifnull((select sum(ooss.outbound_quantity) from outbound_order_shop_sku ooss where ooss.outbound_order_id=oo.id),0) outboundQuantityTotal from outbound_order oo
and shop_id =#{shopId} and outbound_time>= #{outboundTimeStart} and outbound_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{outboundTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and batch_number like concat('%',#{batchNumber},'%')
and fba_no like concat('%',#{fbaNo},'%')
and exists (select 1 from outbound_order_shop_sku ooss,shop_sku ss where ooss.outbound_order_id=oo.id and ooss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%'))
and status=#{status} and type=#{type}
order by oo.create_time desc
